adventurer.description: Though new to the Dungeons, and maybe a bit confused about just *who* Duckworth is, Adventurer's seek fame, fortune, and to unlock the secrets of the dungeons!

Strong Attack.effect: Next attack does an additional 25(+0.5/jlvl)% damage

Tough Defense.effect: Block the next attack, reducing all damage you would receive by 60%

First Aid.effect: Heal for 15 - 25% of your max hp
